control.title: Thermal Driver Polling Frequency
control.description:
High values provides more stable thermals while throttling. Low values have lower CPU impact. This value is used only if current SOC temperature up to 15Â°C below throttling threshold temp. On low temp used: 4CpS.
[0   4   5   8   10   20   25   40]
Cycles per Second (CpS).
Select 0 to choose default polling frequency.
